intro: Ten years of experience, international teams, diverse projects. It gives us perspective on what actually delivers results.

collaborative.title: Collaborative
collaborative.description: We work alongside your team, not in isolation. Regular communication and alignment ensure we're always building what matters.

detailOriented.title: Detail-Oriented
detailOriented.description: Quality is in the details. From code reviews to documentation, we maintain high standards across every aspect of development.

pragmatic.title: Pragmatic
pragmatic.description: We choose technologies and patterns that solve real problems. No over-engineering, no hype-driven development.

discovery.description: Understand your goals, constraints, and technical landscape

planning.description: Define architecture, milestones, and success criteria

development.description: Iterative implementation with regular reviews and demos

delivery.description: Production deployment, documentation, and knowledge transfer
